captions.text: Alarm rings in my ears, waking you
Tears fill my blank eyes, I drop my head
I promise not to think about you anymore
but the alarm keeps going off
I can't forget even if I wanted to
You left so cold, so firm
but the alarm keeps going off
I can't live even if I wanted to
Wake up stupid, stop being silly
So why am I tangled in the past?
our love can't be lit again
I know that, so why do I
I guess I can sigh it out
mean nothing in front of our broken selves
You left so cold, so firm
Wake up stupid, stop being silly
So why am I tangled in the past?

comments.author: Andi Howell

comments.text:
I know you're not being too serious, but I'll have to disagree by a lot 
with you on that. 

Their ballads or calm songs are what I think shows their singing talents so 
well. Also for the self-made songs like Lost Memory and You've Moved On, 
the lyrics touch your hearts(especially if you can understand Korean) and 
the slightly sad but generally relaxing melodies match their smooth voices 
so well. 

Boyfriend is currently known for the twisted fairy tales for the title 
songs and for the other ones in the album, soothing, sometimes cheery, 
sometimes lively, but almost all of them being so relaxed. 

Since a lot of those relaxed songs are break-up songs, I strongly disagree 
on them singing ONLY happy songs.
